alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 700 PM MST... At 615 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Globe, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Top Of The World, Central Heights-Midland City, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool, and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 230 and 253. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 254. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 155 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
